debug.name: Debug Mode (Development Feature)
debug.description: Sends a message in the chat every tick you're holding a tool.

lastHit.name: Warn on last hit
lastHit.description: Warns you when your tool is at 1 durability

messages.lastHit: §cYou should stop using this tool now, this is your last hit!
messages.warning: §cDo you really want to continue using this tool? Its durability is at %s%%!
messages.debug:
§e§m   §e§l[ Event triggered ]§e§m   
§7Event: §b%s in main hand
§7Max durability: §b%s
§7Current durability: §b%s
§7Warn durability: §b%s
§e§m

command.invalidSubcommand: §cPlease provide a valid subcommand! [disable, format, debug, config]
command.onOnceOff: §cPlease provide a valid argument! [on, once, off]
command.noEventTriggered:
§e§m   §e§l[ No event triggered ]§e§m   
§7Event: §8-
§7Max durability: §8-
§7Current durability: §8-
§7Warn durability: §8-
§e§m
